page.title: 03WEST HUNTINGTOWER (3)
page.content: An agricultural Machinery business has been in West Huntingtower for eighteen years. It is a family concern and the sight was chosen for its country situation and because premises were available. There are five other branches in Central Scotland. All types of farm machinery are sold and serviced. Fifteen people are employed. A filling station is near the village and it has been open for over fifty years. Two types of petrol are available and Calor Gas is supplied. Cycle repairs are carried out and five people are employed. The whole area is covered by Methven District Council.
